title: Having lagg spikes even having good internet connection :(Attempting to Reconnect) (Video of it)
body:
So i've been playing for 2y and this has never happened to me, but for some reason, the last 3 days i've been having lag spikes even the game runes on 58ms most of the time, and the message Attempting to reconnect appears every 10 seconds or so: i uploaded a video of it where u can see that all works kinda fine but it just keeps freezing.
Any solutions? Thx.

replies.body: I'm having the exact same issue, but it started with the new patch. It goes to over a 1000 ping and then drops, after reaching 100 pings or so, it immediately goes up again, freezing the game for 2 seconds, before allowing me to play for like a second. It cycles through over and over again.

It looks like your network is having an issue maintaining a connection with the game servers.  We have a [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide that should help get this fixed up for you.  There will be a series of steps to take, so be sure to try each one.  If your issue persists, though, let me know!
